title: Carlos Lago! (Edmunds)
description:
New Shirts: https://www.blipshift/com/tst

Carlos Lago is a host and Manager of Feature Content at Edmunds, and former host of Motor Trend's "Ignition" and "Daily Fix". He's a fast driver and a good human. 

Watch his ZR1 vs GT3 vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QJ0QnAHeux0

Read his things: https://www.edmunds.com/about/authors/carlos-lago.html

Watch the show on YouTube: https://youtu.be/fYHeLGlfXUc

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @carloslago

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @carloslago6
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
